item.title: Custom Items
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

Alright, with the client I have, I’ve been wanting to create some of my custom (colored) items. I have a code that was already in here, for a black dragon chain, but… How would I change the color of, lets say… A Guthans body or something, what would I change in this code so it knows that it is the Guthan body?

if(i == 15344) //item id//black dragon chain
        {
            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];
            class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];
            class8.anIntArray156[0] = 914;
            class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8;
            class8.anIntArray156[1] = 918;
            class8.anIntArray160[1] = 8;
            class8.anIntArray156[2] = 922;
            class8.anIntArray160[2] = 8;
            class8.anIntArray156[3] = 391;
            class8.anIntArray160[3] = 8;
            class8.anIntArray156[4] = 917;
            class8.anIntArray160[4] = 8;
            class8.anInt181 = 1100;
            class8.anInt190 = 568;
            class8.anInt198 = 0;
            class8.anInt204 = 0;
            class8.anInt169 = 0;
            class8.anInt194 = 2;
            class8.anInt165 = 3820;
            class8.anInt200 = 3821;
            class8.anInt174 = 3823;
            class8.anInt188 = 156;
            class8.anInt164 = 337;
            class8.anInt175 = -1;
            class8.anInt197 = -1;
            class8.aString170 = "Black Dragon Chain";
            class8.aByteArray178 = "Black Dragon Chain".getBytes();
        }
